name: nairobi-cbd-ai-traffic-management
description: AI-powered traffic management system for Nairobi CBD

scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint

author: Nairobi Traffic Management Team
